Pre-Game Insights: Lithuania aim to kick off their Nations League campaign in great manner
Cyprus aim to build on a routine 4-1 win over San Marino
Edgaras Jankauskas’ men are tough to beat at home
Grigoris Kastanos is a man to watch in the away team
Miscellaneous Highlights: Lithuania was occupied by Soviet Union in 1940 and regained their independence in 1990
Lithuania have yet to book their place at the finals of a major tournament
Marius Stankevicius is considered Lithuania’s most notable footballer
LFF Stadium is the home ground of the Lithuania national football team and the venue, who capacity is 5.067, was opened in 2004
Others: Lithuania failed to impress in the EURO 2024 qualifiers, with the team collecting only six points
The Cypriotes, on the other hand, aim to build on a routine 4-1 win over San Marino
